root.title: du pont co dd launch improv aramid fiber
root.body: du pont co sai devlop new gener high strength aramid fiber stiffer less absorb previou gener du pont sai new product kevlar 149 40 pct stiffer first gener aramid absorb less half moister similar aramid fiber kevlar invent du pont late 1960 five time stronger steel 10 time stronger aluminum equal wieght basi us replac metal varieti product accord compani
